00048 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00067 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00068 class RMLInputParameters
00069 {
00070 
00071 protected:
00072 
00073 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00093 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00094     RMLInputParameters(const unsigned int DegreesOfFreedom)
00095     {
00096         this->NumberOfDOFs                  =   DegreesOfFreedom                        ;
00097         this->MinimumSynchronizationTime    =   0.0                                     ;
00098         this->OverrideValue                 =   1.0                                     ;
00099         this->SelectionVector               =   new RMLBoolVector   (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00100         this->CurrentPositionVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00101         this->CurrentVelocityVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00102         this->CurrentAccelerationVector     =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00103         this->MaxAccelerationVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00104         this->MaxJerkVector                 =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00105         this->TargetVelocityVector          =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00106         this->MaxPositionVector             =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00107         this->MinPositionVector             =   new RMLDoubleVector (DegreesOfFreedom)  ;
00108         
00109         memset(this->SelectionVector->VecData               ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(bool))    ;
00110         memset(this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData         ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00111         memset(this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData         ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00112         memset(this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData     ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00113         memset(this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData         ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00114         memset(this->MaxJerkVector->VecData                 ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00115         memset(this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData          ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00116         memset(this->MaxPositionVector->VecData             ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00117         memset(this->MinPositionVector->VecData             ,   0x0 ,       DegreesOfFreedom * sizeof(double))  ;
00118     }
00119 
00120 public:
00121 
00122 
00123 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00142 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00143     enum ErrorCodeForInvalidInputValues
00144     {
00147         IP_NO_ERROR                     =   0,
00150         IP_MAX_VELOCITY                 =   1,
00153         IP_MAX_ACCELERATION             =   2,      
00156         IP_MAX_JERK                     =   3,
00159         IP_TARGET_VELOCITY              =   4,
00162         IP_ORDER_OF_MAGNITUDE           =   5,
00165         IP_MINIMUM_SYNC_TIME            =   6,    
00168         IP_OVERRIDE_VALUE               =   7,
00169     };
00170 
00171 
00172 
00173 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00185 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00186     RMLInputParameters(const RMLInputParameters &IP)
00187     {
00188         this->SelectionVector               =   new RMLBoolVector   ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00189         this->CurrentPositionVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00190         this->CurrentVelocityVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00191         this->CurrentAccelerationVector     =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00192         this->MaxAccelerationVector         =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00193         this->MaxJerkVector                 =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00194         this->TargetVelocityVector          =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00195         this->MaxPositionVector             =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00196         this->MinPositionVector             =   new RMLDoubleVector ((IP.CurrentPositionVector)->GetVecDim())   ;
00197 
00198         *this                               =   IP                                                              ;
00199     }
00200 
00201 
00202 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00207 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00208     ~RMLInputParameters(void)
00209     {
00210         delete  this->SelectionVector               ;
00211         delete  this->CurrentPositionVector         ;
00212         delete  this->CurrentVelocityVector         ;
00213         delete  this->CurrentAccelerationVector     ;
00214         delete  this->MaxAccelerationVector         ;
00215         delete  this->MaxJerkVector                 ;
00216         delete  this->TargetVelocityVector          ;
00217         delete  this->MaxPositionVector             ;
00218         delete  this->MinPositionVector             ;
00219 
00220         this->SelectionVector           =   NULL    ;
00221         this->CurrentPositionVector     =   NULL    ;
00222         this->CurrentVelocityVector     =   NULL    ;       
00223         this->CurrentAccelerationVector =   NULL    ;
00224         this->MaxAccelerationVector     =   NULL    ;
00225         this->MaxJerkVector             =   NULL    ;
00226         this->TargetVelocityVector      =   NULL    ;
00227         this->MaxPositionVector         =   NULL    ;
00228         this->MinPositionVector         =   NULL    ;
00229         this->NumberOfDOFs              =   0       ;
00230     }
00231     
00232     
00233 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00244 //  ----------------------------------------------------------  
00245     RMLInputParameters &operator = (const RMLInputParameters &IP)
00246     {
00247         this->NumberOfDOFs                      =   IP.NumberOfDOFs                 ;
00248         this->MinimumSynchronizationTime        =   IP.MinimumSynchronizationTime   ;
00249         this->OverrideValue                     =   IP.OverrideValue                ;
00250         *(this->SelectionVector             )   =   *(IP.SelectionVector            );
00251         *(this->CurrentPositionVector       )   =   *(IP.CurrentPositionVector      );
00252         *(this->CurrentVelocityVector       )   =   *(IP.CurrentVelocityVector      );
00253         *(this->CurrentAccelerationVector   )   =   *(IP.CurrentAccelerationVector  );
00254         *(this->MaxAccelerationVector       )   =   *(IP.MaxAccelerationVector      );
00255         *(this->MaxJerkVector               )   =   *(IP.MaxJerkVector              );
00256         *(this->TargetVelocityVector        )   =   *(IP.TargetVelocityVector       );
00257         *(this->MaxPositionVector           )   =   *(IP.MaxPositionVector          );
00258         *(this->MinPositionVector           )   =   *(IP.MinPositionVector          );
00259 
00260         return(*this);
00261     }       
00262

00304     {

00306                 ,   (void*)InputVector
00307                 ,   (this->SelectionVector->GetVecDim() * sizeof(bool)) );
00308     }

00390 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00411 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00412     inline void GetSelectionVectorElement(      bool                *InputValue
00413                                             ,   const unsigned int  &Index) const
00414     {
00415         if ( ( Index + 1 ) > ((unsigned int) this->SelectionVector->GetVecDim() ) )
00416         {
00417             *InputValue =   0.0;
00418         }
00419         else
00420         {   
00421             *InputValue =   (*this->SelectionVector)[Index];
00422         }
00423     }

01642                 ,   (this->MaxPositionVector->GetVecDim() * sizeof(double)) );
01643     }
01644 
01645

01663 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
01664     inline void SetMaxPositionVectorElement(        const double        &InputValue
01665                                                 ,   const unsigned int  &Index)
01666     {

01668     }

01747 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
01748     inline void GetMaxPositionVectorElement(        double              *InputValue
01749                                                 ,   const unsigned int  &Index) const
01750     {
01751         if ( ( Index + 1 ) > ((unsigned int) this->MaxPositionVector->GetVecDim() ) )
01752         {
01753             *InputValue =   0.0;
01754         }
01755         else
01756         {   
01757             *InputValue =   (*this->MaxPositionVector)[Index];
01758         }
01759     }

02073 
02074 protected:
02075 
02076 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
02087 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
02088     void Echo(FILE* FileHandler = stdout) const
02089     {
02090         unsigned int        i   =   0;
02091         
02092         if (FileHandler == NULL)
02093         {
02094             return;
02095         }
02096         
02097         fprintf(FileHandler,   "Selection vector           : ");
02098         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02099         {
02100             fprintf(FileHandler, " %s ", (this->SelectionVector->VecData[i])?("true"):("false"));
02101         }
02102         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nCurrent position vector    : ");
02103         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02104         {
02105             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData[i]);
02106         }
02107         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nCurrent velocity vector    : ");
02108         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02109         {
02110             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData[i]);
02111         }
02112         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nCurrent acceleration vector: ");
02113         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02114         {
02115             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData[i]);
02116         }       
02117         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nTarget velocity vector     : ");
02118         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02119         {
02120             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData[i]);
02121         }       
02122         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nMax. acceleration vector   : ");
02123         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02124         {
02125             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData[i]);
02126         }       
02127         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nMax. jerk vector           : ");
02128         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02129         {
02130             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->MaxJerkVector->VecData[i]);
02131         }
02132         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nMax. position vector        : ");
02133         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02134         {
02135             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->MaxPositionVector->VecData[i]);
02136         }
02137         fprintf(FileHandler, "\nMin. position vector        : ");
02138         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
02139         {
02140             fprintf(FileHandler, " %.20le ", this->MinPositionVector->VecData[i]);
02141         }       
02142                 
02143         fprintf(FileHandler, "\n");
02144         return;
02145     }
